extension.name: Sticky Mobile Menu - Gantry Atom (Hydrogen)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Sticky Mobile Menu - Atom for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTA: La atomo viene installata per Gantry Hydrogen.
Se si desidera installare su un template Gantry diverso, bisogna posizionare i file come segue:

  • *.yaml => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
  • *.twig => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
  • *.js => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/js
